subject: Greetings of peace and happi
body:
Greetings of peace and happiness to you, my name is Mrs. Serah Jones, I am terminally ill and have decided to donate my inheritance from my husband to you. No doubt, you may wonder how I got to know you and your information, and what informed my decision to Will my fortune to you, Dear, you have no cause to worry about these questions, I mean no harm. Regarding how I got your personal details, it is through the the help of the nurse assigned to attend to me in my private ward in this hospital, because I cannot surf on my own due to partial stroke, it is the nurse who surfs for me under my direction because I feel to donate my fortune to an individual and your profile was chosen.
I am 58 years old woman with no child and have been diagnosed with acute cancer for about 2 years now, shortly after the death of my husband here , which made me hypertensive and resulted in a stroke. In my present condition, life is without meaning to me and hope has since eluded me, each day I give my entire existence a thought, I feel overpowered by gloom and despair, also saw nothing but death lurking around, All these are my reasons for deciding on using anything in my name for charity in which co-incidentally you have been favored as the beneficiary. I must tell you that I was truly touched by my inner mind to take this decision action, and I will advice you donâ€™t see your windfall as avenue for pleasure spree but should see it as an opportunity to build and grow your personal finances to an enviable level and help others, for both your benefit and the benefit of others, always put me in your prayers and ask God to forgive my sins and trespasses. I shall be undergoing major operations in less than two weeks from now and have willed my inheritance funds to you and to help the less-privileged around you.
If you are sure that you will use the donated fund as I have advised here, get back to me for more details. Thanks and regards
Mrs. Serah Jones.

subject: Re:   Greetings of peace and happi
body:
Hello Mrs. Serah Jones,

I'm deeply touched by your message and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly admirable that you're thinking of helping others in such a difficult time.

However, I must admit, I'm quite surprised by your generous offer. Could you please tell me more about how you came across my profile? And could you also share more details about the charity work you'd like me to carry out with the funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
*Dearest Jacqueline,*


*I greet you in the name of our lord Jesus Christ, i am so glad to hear
from you again, how are you and your family, hope you are doing good. Thank
you for your sincere prayers and also for the interest you indicated to
help receive my fund. *

*My health condition is worsening day by day and i would like you to
receive my fund as soon as possible before anything happens to me, as am
writing to you now, am having severe pains all over my body, please my dear
i would like to know you very well so that i  will give further
instructions on how to receive my fund. *

*Can you give me details of yourself, where are you from and also i want
you to promise me that you will not disappoint me when you receive my fund.
Will you be able to carry out my wish? As soon as i hear from you i will
give you further details in respect to my fund. *

*Thank you and may God bless you.*

*Yours in Christ*
*Serah Jones.*

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Serah Jones,

I'm so sorry to hear about your health condition. I hope you're getting the best care possible. It's really kind of you to think of others in such a difficult time.

I'm from a small town, and I live a simple life. I enjoy helping people whenever I can, it gives me great joy and satisfaction.

As for your fund, could you please provide more details? How do you wish for it to be used? What are your expectations from me?

Please take care of yourself and remember that every day is a blessing.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
*My dearest Jacqueline** I'm very happy and pray that God will use you to
accomplish this assignment with my inheritance to help the less *
*privileged** in our society before I give to Ghost.*

*I am very sick and I could not write to you about my health. My doctor
advised me not to get up from my bed to avoid damaging my body's system. I
want you to contact my my husband Attorney to issue you legal documents
that will allow you to receive my fund from First National Bank of South
Africa worth $7.2 United States Dollars in your account before I die.*

*Communicate with my Attorney with this email address so that he can issue
the legal documents that will allow you to receive my inheritance to work
for the Lord and the less privileged in your society and the poor. *

*Email address: jose1antonio211@gmail.com <jose1antonio211@gmail.com>*
*Phone number:+27 640017861*




*Contact him today and contact me to follow him to issue you legal
documents that will allow you to receive my inheritance fund to work for
the Lord. Please get back to me immediately you contact my husband Attorney
so that I can direct you as well. Best wishesMrs. Serah Jones*

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Serah Jones,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. I hope you get better soon. It's very noble of you to think about the less privileged in our society during such a tough time.

You mentioned that there is a fund at the First National Bank of South Africa, and you want me to contact your husband's attorney. Could you please tell me more about this fund? How did it come into existence? And how do you envision it being used for the benefit of the less privileged?

Also, could you provide more details about your husband's attorney? What is his name and how long has he been practicing law?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Dearest Jacqueline,

God bless you with peace amen. The fund was deposited into South Africa
bank before my husband died in car accident in 2001. I want you to use this
fund to help the less-privileged around the world today and build church in
your home town where everyone will come and praise God every Sunday.

My dear Jacqueline my husband Attorney name is Jose Antonio so please
contact him today to help you secure the legal documents that will empower
you to receive my hund from First National Bank of South Africa worth 7.2
million USD before I give to ghost because my health condition is getting
worse day by day. I shall wait to receive your email now after contacting
my Attorney. May God bless you with peace and happiness amen.
Best regards
Mrs Serah Jones.

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Mrs. Serah Jones,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your husband's unfortunate accident. It's a noble cause you're pursuing, using the funds to help those in need and build a church.

Could you please provide more details about this project? How exactly do you envision the church being built and operated? Also, could you tell me more about your husband's attorney, Jose Antonio? What is his experience in handling such matters?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Dearest Jacqueline,


I'm very glad to hear from you again. My health condition doesn't allow me
write much with you that's why I asked you to contact my Attorney who will
direct more about this fund because I can't stay long in the computer.

I would like you to build the church as I'm a Roman catholic and my Late
husband too. Please my dear can you tell me where you from and if you are a
woman or man? You never answered my question from the first time we started
talking. You only ask me questions.

Please kindly reply to me and remain blessed Amen.
Thanks
Mrs Serah Jones.

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Mrs. Serah Jones,

I'm so sorry to hear about your health condition. I hope you're getting the best care possible. It's really kind of you to think about building a church, that's such a noble cause.

As for me, I'd rather not disclose my gender or location at this time. I hope you understand, it's just a personal preference of mine. 

Could you tell me more about your late husband? What was he like? And how did you both decide on this wonderful idea of building a church?

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Mrs. Serah Jones,

I'm so sorry to hear about your health condition. I hope you're getting the best care possible. It's really kind of you to think about building a church, that's such a noble cause.

As for me, I'd rather not disclose my gender or location at this time. I hope you understand, it's just a personal preference of mine. 

Could you tell me more about this fund? How did it come into existence and what are its main objectives? Also, could you share more details about the church project?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Dearest Jacqueline,

I think we can't carry on with my wishes due to how you are. I will surely
get someone who will help me realize my dream and what I promised God
before giving to ghost.
Thanks
Mrs Serah Jones.

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello Mrs. Serah Jones,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way, but I'd like to understand more about your situation. Could you please elaborate on what your dream is and what promise you made to God? I'm here to listen and help in any way I can.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello there! It seems like you're in a hurry. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss before you go?

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello

You are not willing to carry on my wishes. So we don't have much to discuss.

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello there! I'm sorry if I gave you that impression. I'm here to chat and learn more about what you have to share. Could you tell me a bit more about it?

Best wishes,
Jacqueline

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Hello

I'm not here to chat or teach you what you need to learn. Goodbye

subject: Re: Dearest Jacqueline God bless you!
body:
Oh, I see. But could you please share a bit more about what you do? It sounds really interesting!

Best wishes,
Jacqueline
